name: Mission Cover-Up
description:
My entry for the very first gotmjam!

Controls:
Use arrow keys to move around (alternatively WASD, not recommended)
E to kill enemies when you are close, plant bombs, and exit the stage
V to enter and move through ventilation systems
Hold CTRL to move the camera around

Objective:
Eliminate all scientists and rig the place to explode in order to cover up the secrets hiding deep within the facility.
Avoid the guards. You are not equipped to eliminate them. Being spotted means an instant mission failure.
